translation.it: fece un discorso molto bello e incredibilmente romantico.

translation.en: And so I sort of felt in the moment.
translation.it: E in quel momento mi sentii travolta dalle emozioni.

translation.en: [Nick] Sarma G-chatted me. She was like, "Hey, I'm coming to LA."
translation.it: Sarma mi disse su ChitChat che sarebbe venuta a Los Angeles.

translation.en: I picked her up from the airport. She gets in. We're laughing.
translation.it: Andai a prenderla all'aeroporto. Stavamo ridendo

translation.en: And on the way home, she, like, shows me her wedding ring.
translation.it: e, mentre guidavo, mi mostrò la sua fede nuziale.

translation.en: She's like, "I got married."
translation.it: Fece: "Mi sono sposata".

translation.en: And I was like, "Oh my God. Congratulations."
translation.it: E io: "Oddio, congratulazioni!"

translation.en: I, I mean, I had no idea.
translation.it: Non ne avevo idea.

translation.en: And then she goes on to say how she met this guy, and he's very cool.
translation.it: Poi mi raccontò come lo aveva conosciuto e che era fantastico.

translation.en: And then she says, "I haven't told anyone at the restaurant yet."
translation.it: E poi disse: "Non l'ho detto a nessuno al ristorante".

translation.en: And it makes me go like, "What? Why?" Like, wha…
translation.it: Mi fece pensare: "Cosa? Perché?"

translation.en: If you're with someone, and you agree to get married to them,
translation.it: Se stai con uno e accetti di sposarlo,

translation.en: don't you want essentially the people that care about you to know?
translation.it: non vuoi che le persone che ti sono vicine lo sappiano?

translation.en: It was very specific.
translation.it: Era molto particolare.

translation.en: She never told me she was getting married.
translation.it: Non mi disse che si sarebbe sposata.

translation.en: It was like a non-event. It was kind of…
translation.it: Non fu una cosa importante. Fu solo…

translation.en: You might think it's peculiar, but, you know, it's like…
translation.it: Potrete pensare che sia strano, ma è stato come…

translation.en: Yeah, there's no celebration.
translation.it: Nessun festeggiamento.

translation.en: I thought, "Damn, you could do better than that, you know."
translation.it: Pensai: "Potresti avere di meglio".

translation.en: One night, I was at the restaurant,
translation.it: Una sera, ero al ristorante

translation.en: and Shane texted me that they had gotten married.
translation.it: e Shane mi mandò un messaggio, dicendomi che si erano sposati.

translation.en: And it sounded romantic.
translation.it: E sembrava romantico.

translation.en: And on one level, I'm like, "Well, he sounds excited."
translation.it: Da un lato, pensavo: "Beh, lui sembra su di giri".

translation.en: And I want to be. But all along, it had been like,
translation.it: E anch'io volevo esserlo. Ma continuavo a pensare:

translation.en: "Sarma, what's… You're not… What is happening?"
translation.it: "Sarma, cosa… Non sei… Che sta succedendo?"

translation.en: So I think I texted her because I wanted to confirm this,
translation.it: Penso che le scrissi, perché volevo la conferma,

translation.en: and she confirmed it with zero excitement.
translation.it: e lei me la diede, senza il minimo entusiasmo.

translation.en: She had this awesome ring. I think it's on her book cover,
translation.it: Aveva un anello favoloso. Forse è sulla copertina del libro.

translation.en: this ring that I loved that had all these dangling things.
translation.it: Mi piaceva e aveva un sacco di ciondoli.

translation.en: It was Latvian. She's Latvian. And I always complimented her on it.
translation.it: Era lettone, come anche lei, e mi piaceva un sacco.

translation.en: And then one day, I noticed she had it on her ring finger at the restaurant,
translation.it: Un giorno, notai che se lo era messo all'anulare

translation.en: and I sort of kiddingly…
translation.it: e, in modo scherzoso…

translation.en: I was hoping I was kidding, but kind of knew that I wasn't,
translation.it: Speravo che fosse uno scherzo, ma sapevo che non era così.

translation.en: and I said, "Oh, did you put that ring there to distract from your wedding ring?"
translation.it: Le dissi: "Hai messo l'anello lì per distogliere l'attenzione dalla fede?"

translation.en: And she was like, "Yes."
translation.it: E lei: "Sì".

translation.en: As a couple, they weren't really like a couple, you know?
translation.it: Come coppia, non si comportavano da coppia.

translation.en: Like they never, like, held hands. They weren't really affectionate.
translation.it: Non si tenevano mai per mano. Non si scambiavano effusioni.

translation.en: What? Like, you guys got married?
translation.it: "Cosa? Vi siete sposati?"

translation.en: Like, it was like a big, like, surprise for everybody.
translation.it: Fu una sorpresa per tutti quanti.

translation.en: It didn't feel like a love story. It was just, you know, kind of weird.
translation.it: Non sembrava affatto una storia d'amore. Era strano, in un certo senso.

translation.en: There were tons of conspiracy theories about
translation.it: C'erano molte teorie del complotto

translation.en: why she married him, was there some sort of blackmail involved,
translation.it: sul perché l'avesse sposato, su un possibile ricatto

translation.en: or what it could possibly be.
translation.it: o su quale fosse il motivo.

translation.en: [Sarma] He told me that he had some sort of like underground government official military affiliation.
translation.it: Mi disse di avere conoscenze nell'esercito e contatti segreti al governo.

translation.en: So that now, I would be, like, protected as his wife.
translation.it: Così ora, in quanto sua moglie, sarei stata protetta.

translation.en: So at some point, he, via email,
translation.it: A un certo punto, tramite e-mail,

translation.en: introduced me to somebody named Will Richards,
translation.it: mi presentò un certo Will Richards,

translation.en: some sort of computer techie expert
translation.it: un esperto informatico

translation.en: that works in the government somewhere in Europe.
translation.it: che lavorava in un qualche governo europeo. WILL RICHARDS A: SARMA MELNGAILIS

translation.en: [man] Shane and I were working together for years.
translation.it: Shane e io lavoravamo insieme da anni.

translation.en: There's a lot that I can't divulge.
translation.it: C'è molto che non posso divulgare.
